page.title: 16The Sports Association.
page.content: Three years ago the County Council wanted a place to build a new school.A Sports Association of all sporting clubs had just been formed and everybody knew that half the Playing field was never used.The field Committee was asked to sell the top half for a new school and use the funds gained to improve the facilities at the field. Firstly the field was levelled and Changing Rooms were built,the voluntary labour and the monies raised was probably worth about #25000! This year we have seen the second phase finished,the two tennis courts. Some want the next phase to be a Bowling Green,but in the beginning it was planned to provide an extra large hall for the new school,this could then be used by us for indoor sport.Badminton is played in the Hall.
